name: Beat or Treat
description:
Welcome to this year's Halloween, where you have to fight off hordes of children and ghosts! Fence the kids off with treats! However... not every kid wants the same treat! Use the good, old vacuum against the ghosts! As soon as the clock strikes full hour, there will be a special ghost waiting for you! Can you survive until Halloween is over? 

Use the 1, 2, 3 number keys and click on the kids, to give them the treat they want. And use 4 and hold the click button to suck in those troublesome ghost! Last but not least, use ESC to pause the game! Happy hunting time!
